channel.title: Military Vox Effect/Processing
channel.description: To all the sound designers on the team, I was wondering what processing and effects were put on the military vox in WGH and onwards. it's probably my favourite part of the game (weirdly enough), and i wanted to create a similar effect myself. so, what effects were put on the voice? thanks :thumbsup:

item.title: Military Vox Effect/Processing
item.dc:creator: AsinoEsel
item.description:
Not a dev, but I’m guessing High Pass filter is one of them. Makes things sound radio-ish.

Read full topic
